product_name: Sprigs Touch Mesh Banjees Wrist Wallet
long_description: The Sprigs Touch Mesh Banjees(TM) wrist wallet holds your cell phone or mobile device and lets you use the touch screen while you're running, cycling, hiking, walking or climbing. Mesh on the pocket is strong enough to keep your phone secure, but thin enough to allow you to see your screen and swipe, tap and even pinch zoom. Zippered pocket is sized to fit a smartphone, PDA or digital music player. Fabric stretches, allowing it to slide over your hand onto your wrist.
short_description: The Sprigs Touch Mesh Banjees(TM) wrist wallet holds your cell phone or mobile device and lets you use the touch screen while you're running, cycling, hiking, walking or climbing.
